title: Riot please fix this. Turning off PC on Champion Select doesn't count as a dodge.
body: My PC shut down because of load shedding. I was in champion select and when pc shut down for some reason i was still in the champ select? The game started even though i left. I just opened my client and I see i got leaver punishment. What type of sorcery is this? And if possible, can I get my Leaverbuster appealed? Thanks

replies.body: It sucks that your PC might have forced a restart right before a game started, but if you leave during champion select it will still count as a dodge. We aren't able to help much with [**leaverbusters**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) of this kind, since those other players were still left with a 4v5 match.
I understand. This was really just unlucky for me. I hope this problem gets solved as it didn't count as a dodge.
